pullrequest.title: Merge ardupilot with gazebo8 (update to pull request #2450)

content.raw: Also to make the connection: #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2691/update-wind-plugin-to-support-being-used/diff improves the wind plugin under the hood of this PR. It's not required however for this PR.
content.html: Also to make the connection: #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2691/update-wind-plugin-to-support-being-used/diff improves the wind plugin under the hood of this PR. It's not required however for this PR.

pullrequest.title: Merge ardupilot with gazebo8 (update to pull request #2450)

content.raw:
From @pkancir in #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2450/ardupilot-refactor-and-minor-improvements/diff#comment-35491971

Arf too bad... I already got a branch with all this done... but I am on vacation until next week... I got some little fix to add too. Before merge into gazebo, can we merge #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2676 and https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/333/. Those can be extract from this plugin to simplify it. At last, arducopterplugin isn't needed as ardupilotplugin can handle all vehicle type !


I'm also travelling through next week. But wanted to push this more upstream as my project using it is wrapping up.

pullrequest.title: Merge ardupilot with gazebo8 (update to pull request #2450)

content.html:
@scpeters @tfoote PR done here #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2694/ardupilot-merge-gazebo8-khancyr/ I don't add the arducopter plugin removal. Should we review those PR first and then add it ? or should I directly add it ?

It works for me with iris, iris + irlock, rover, iris+irlock over rover
